items.sentence: Since Tom couldn\'t make a decent living as a nightclub musician, he had to get a day job.
Tom looked hot and tired, so I offered him a cold drink and told him to sit down and rest.
Tom can\'t help wondering whether he would have been better off if he had gone to college.
That man asked me who I was, but I didn\'t think it was necessary to answer that question.
I told Tom the reason I didn\'t want to do it was that I didn\'t think it was a good idea.
Even though I\'ve studied French for a long time, I\'m still not very good at speaking it.
Tom\'s mother had trouble getting him to take the medicine that the doctor had prescribed.
Tom told Mary that he was going to kill himself, but he didn\'t have the courage to do it.
Tom, Mary, John and Alice are friends. They\'ve known each other since they were children.
Do you have any ideas on how we can make sure Tom sticks around until the job is finished?
Tom couldn\'t go on the picnic with us today because he had an important business meeting.
I don\'t think I\'ll ever sound like a native speaker and I don\'t really think I need to.
Tom and Mary have been too busy fighting to notice how much they actually like each other.
I don\'t know if you\'ve noticed, but Tom seems to have fallen in love with your daughter.
Tom thought there should be a limit on how much money his wife should be allowed to spend.

The reason Tom and Mary look worried is that one of their children is having an operation.
If I\'d studied French harder when I was in school, I\'d probably not be so bad at it now.
